attributes.action: Give war medals to those who deserve ones, e.g. forgotten wars, Malaysia
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently medals have been given out to many servicemen for well known wars such as world war two and iraq. My grandad fought in the Malaysian war against terror in the 1950's and has never recieved a medal. Im sure this applys for many ex-service men in the UK who fought hard and had no recognition, please sign my petition!!
